oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bargain Bonanza at National Guard Armory Layout 1 (19506)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Fund raising; Layout (Printing);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (red and black on brown) announcing a Bargain Bonanza at National Guard Armory on February 25. Errors on the poster are crossed out and corrected in pen. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/48217/
